snippet.title: Prince of Persia 3D - Full Game Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Prince of Persia 3D is a third-person action-adventure game developed by Mindscape and Avalanche Software, and published by Red Orb Entertainment and Mattel Interactive, released in late 1999 for Microsoft Windows, and later in 2000 for Dreamcast. It follows the story of the Prince of Persia, who is on a quest to save his lover, Princess Jasmine, from the evil Vizier Jaffar. The game is set in a fictional Persian world where the Prince must navigate through various locations, including palaces, dungeons, and ruins, to find and defeat Jaffar. Along the way, the Prince battles various enemies, solves puzzles, and acquires new weapons and abilities to aid him in his journey. The game features multiple endings, depending on the player's choices, revealing the true nature of Jaffar's evil plans and the Prince's fate.

===== Mods Used =====
• dgVoodoo2 (by Dege): http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2/
• Widescreen Fix (by if_and_while): https://community.pcgamingwiki.com/files/file/2241-prince-of-persia-3d-widescreen-fix/

===== Game Info =====
• Developers: Mindscape (PC), Avalanche Software (DC)
• Publishers: Red Orb Entertainment (PC), Mattel Interactive (DC)
• Initial release date: September 17, 1999
• Platforms: Microsoft Windows, Dreamcast
• Genres: Action-adventure, Platform
• Engine: NetImmerse (DirectX 6)

===== Walkthrough Info =====
• Platform: Microsoft Windows
• Difficulty: Normal
• Recording: Bandicam
• Editing: VEGAS Pro 19

===== Additional Info =====
• Plot: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_of_Persia_3D#Synopsis
• Essential improvements: https://www.pcgamingwiki.com/wiki/Prince_of_Persia_3D

If you liked the video, please drop a like and consider subscribing for more gameplays and walkthroughs of classic PC games!
